description: Whether you’re picnicking in the park, watching the game at the stadium, or just binge-watching your favorite show from the couch, a good blanket can be a welcome companion. The Anchor Line Blanket is made with Merino wool, so it’s luxuriously soft and comfy. Plus, it can conveniently roll up into a removable carrying handle, so it’s easy to bring along on any excursion. With a classic plaid look and effortless style, this blanket is ready for any adventure.
name: Anchor Line Blanket
